author: lundblad
msg: New RA API.  Part of issue #1931.
If you like reading tons of wrapper functions, if you like API deprecation
and if you really want to read a somewhat longish commit message, then this
commit is for you.  All others: I warned you.
Replace the current plugin/session_baton-based RA API with an API more
like the one in libsvn_fs, with public functions and a single svn_ra_session_t
object.  This involves deprecating the svn_ra_plugin_t structure and some
functions to manipulate it, creating a new svn_ra__vtable_t structure, which
is private to lisvn_ra and the RA implementation libraries and creating
wrappers for all public functions.  In each RA implementation library, a
compatibility wrapper is created that provides the old API.  This has to be
done in each library, since the library initialization functions
(svn_ra_FOO_init) are public and therefore must be preserved.
Thanks to maxb for reviewing an early and incomplete version of this patch.
Copy docstrings from svn_ra_plugin_t with some fixes.
(svn_ra_plugin_t): Deprecate.  Move docstrings to the new API.  Get rid of
get_log2, since that was never released.
(SVN_RA_ABI_VERSION): Note in docstring that we don't use ABI versions
(struct ra_lib_defn): Add schemes field, change type of initfunc and add
(ra_libraries): Initialize new fields.  Change initfunc to the private init
(load_ra_module): Make it return new and/or compat init functions.
(svn_ra_print_ra_libraries): Load each library to get information.  Use new
(svn_ra_init_ra_libs): Don't load the libraries here, just set the returned
(svn_ra_get_ra_library): Load the needed library lazily.  Be stricter
about library version compatibility; we never supported 3rd party
svn_ra_session_t * instead of void *.  Callers updated.
(ra_local_vtable): ...this, change type svn_ra__vtable_t and adjust members
accordingly.  All functions referenced now comply with the new API.
Include libsvn_ra/wrapper_template.h to create a compatibility wrapper.
(ra_svn_log): Rename from ra_svn_log2.  Remove old definition.
(ra_svn_vtable): Renamde from ra_svn_plugin.  Changed type to
svn_ra__vtable_t and adjusted members accordingly.  All functions referenced
in this struct updated to the new RA API.
Include libsvn_ra/wrapper_template.h to create a compatibility wrapper.
(dav_vtable): Renamed from dav_plugin, changed type to svn_ra__vtable_t
and changed members accordingly.  All functions referenced in this struct
Include libsvn_ra/wrapper_template.h to create a compatibility wrapper.
(get_file_from_ra, get_dirprops_from_ra, delete_entry): Use new RA API.
Change ra_lib/session argument pair to svn_ra_session_t.  Use new RA API.
ra_lib/session argument pair with svn_ra_session_t.  Callers updated.
(svn_client__repos_locations): Don't take an ra_lib argument.  Callers
Replace ra_lib/session argument pair with svn_ra_session_t.  Callers updated.
svn_client_proplist2, svn_client_revprop_list): Use new RA API.
Change ra_lib/session argument pair to svn_ra_session_t.  Use new RA API.
(svn_client_uuid_from_url): Use new RA API.  Fix error leak in
(svn_client__repos_locations): Don't take an ra_lib argument.  Use new RA
with svn_ra_session_t.  Use new RA API.  Rename from svn_ra_lib_from_path.
do_single_file_merge, diff_repos_repos, diff_repos_wc): Use new RA API.
argument pair to svn_ra_saession_t.  Callers updated.  Use new RA API.
Remove support for the case where the RA library doesn't define a get_dir
